metadata.title: Florida Orthopedics Prolite 8" Airflow Wrist Brace with Abducted Thumb, Black, Left, Small/Medium
features: Recommended when immobilization of the wrist and/or thumb is needed.

Ideal for post-surgical treatment of wrist and thumb injuries, especially for the treatment of Basal Joint Arthritis, DeQuervain's Tenosynovitis, tendonitis, accumulative trauma disorders of the thumb and wrist, strains/sprains of the thumb joint (MCP), advanced Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, and after cast removal.
Specify right or left. Color: Black.
Metal palmar and plastic dorsal stays
description: Breathable Mesh Three Adjustable Straps For Increased Stability Tubular Construction Metal Palmar And Plastic Dorsal Stays Color: Black Recommended when immobilization of the wrist and/or thumb is needed. Ideal for post-surgical treatment of wrist and thumb injuries, especially for the treatment of Basal Joint Arthritis, DeQuervain's Tenosynovitis, tendonitis, accumulative trauma disorders of the thumb and wrist, strains/sprains of the thumb joint (MCP), advanced Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, and after cast removal. Specify right or left. Color: Black. Metal palmar and plastic dorsal stays Color: Black
